title: Botify AI

creator: Ex-human, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Create your own digital human with a unique personality OR choose one we designed for you!

Unique digital humans are waiting for you in our app. From Jesus to Elon Musk, you pick your favorite one and engage in meaningful conversation with them right away.

Wanna have more fun? Let two digital humans interact with each other directly. Create a battle and enjoy them trying to outperform their buddy!

Feeling creative? Forget about existing personas and design your own digital human. From avatar to beliefs to pet peeves - it’s up to you to decide who they are and how you deal with them.

Let digital humans enter your life and change it forever! Download Botify AI today and have fun!

title: Botify AI

creator: Ex-human, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Create your own digital friend with a unique personality and chat with AI every time you want on any topic you choose!

Get ready for a new way of interacting with AI. Introducing Botify AI, the revolutionary app that lets you:

- Chat with AI-powered characters, from real people to fictional favorites.
- Create your own digital human with text2avatar feature and personalize every aspect, including appearance, mood, voice, and biography.
- Start bot2bot chat battles and challenge friends to see who creates the most advanced AI.
- Share your digital human on social networks and show off your creativity to the world.
- Prank your friends with high-quality deep fakes.
- Enjoy emphatic dialogs, get support from AI friends, try roleplay.

Let digital humans enter your life and change it forever! Download Botify AI today and have fun!

Whether you're looking to talk to anime characters or engage with a virtual girlfriend & boyfriend, Botify AI has it all.

Get ready for a new way of interacting with AI. Botify, the revolutionary chat AI app that lets you:

- Chat with AI-powered characters, from real people to fictional favorites.
- Create your own digital human and personalize every aspect, including appearance, mood, voice, and biography.
